title: Glen Beck Gets OWNED by Whoopie and Barbara

content: I loved watching him squirm and admit to having lied when he was confronted with the irrefutable evidence on The View. Naturally, he changed his tune completely on his show the next day, sounding downright cocky about the previous day's smackdown. He denied having lied about anything, accused the ladies from The View of distorting things, and said he should be demanding an apology from them! Does anyone really wonder why he let the golden opportunity to do just that go by the day before when he was face to face with them? It's funny, and completely expected, that he didn't have the gonads to respond like that when he was face to face with Barbara Walters. He did nothing but grovel and squirm under her gaze.
reply: I loved watching him squirm and admit to having lied when he was confronted with the irrefutable evidence on The View. Naturally, he changed his tune completely on his show the next day, sounding downright cocky about the previous day's smackdown. He denied having lied about anything, accused the ladies from The View of distorting things, and said he should be demanding an apology from them! Does anyone really wonder why he let the golden opportunity to do just that go by the day before when he was face to face with them? It's funny, and completely expected, that he didn't have the gonads to respond like that when he was face to face with Barbara Walters. He did nothing but grovel and squirm under her gaze.
title: Glen Beck Gets OWNED by Whoopie and Barbara

content: Serial liers inevitably get caught in their lies. When you lie about a person (or persons) on your radio or TV show (as he had done about his meeting with Barbara Walters and Whoopi Goldberg), never go on the radio or TV show of the person you lied about. If you do, expect to be called out over your lie. Only really stupid people don't realize that - but Beck has never really show signs of great intelligence.

When you lie about a person (or persons) on your radio or TV show (as he had done about his meeting with Barbara Walters and Whoopi Goldberg), never go on the radio or TV show of the person you lied about. If you do, expect to be called out over your lie. Only really stupid people don't realize that - but Beck has never really show signs of great intelligence.
title: Glen Beck Gets OWNED by Whoopie and Barbara
